    • Method Detail

      • createFileSystemDependentPath

        public static Path createFileSystemDependentPath(URI targetUri)
                                          throws IOException
        Creates the Path dependent on the FileSystem to be retrieved or created due to the URI declaration. This function will also check whether the target of the URI is a zip file. When it is, a new FileSystem will be created (or retrieved if already opened), which represents the zip-file contents.
        Parameters:
        targetUri - URI, the Path should be resolved for.
        Returns:
        the Path dependent on the FileSystem used
        Throws:
        IOException - if the File the URI points to could not be read.

      • isZipFile

        public static boolean isZipFile(URI uri)
                         throws IOException
        Determine whether a file is a ZIP File.
        Parameters:
        uri - URI to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the file is a zip/jar file
        Throws:
        IOException - if the file could not be read.
